subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|食|alt1=飠|t1=food|幷|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} (as in {{zh-l|*餠}}); phonetic component now simplified to {{zh-l|*并}}.
